page.title: 12LEISURE AND RECREATION
page.content: {DEANS COMMUNITY HIGH SCHOOL}IS A SPECIAL KIND OF SCHOOL.AS WELL AS PROVIDING SECONDARY EDUCATION IT ALSO PROVIDES{LEISURE AND RECREATIONAL {FACILITIES}TO ALL OF ITS COMMINITY.PEOPLE OF ALL AGES ARE ENCOURAGED TO PARTICIPATE IN MANY OF THE SPORTS,ARTS,EDUCATIONAL AND LEISURE CLUBS. THE SCHOOL BOASTS FACILITIES SUCH AS ;SWIMMING POOL SPORTS HALL.SQUASH COURT,OUTDOOR PITCHES,SAUNA,GYMNASIUM,THEATRE,CRECH E,PLAYGROUP,COFFEE BAR,RESTAURANT AND LIBRARY.THERE ARE MANY CLUBS THAT USE THE SCHOOL REGULARLY;SWIMMING,CHESS,COMPUTER,DANC ING,KEEP FIT,ART AND CRAFT(TO NAME A FEW).THERE ARE ALSO{PRIVATE SPORT {FACILITIES}IN THE{M.O.T.E.C.}TRAINING CENTRE THE FACILITIES INCLUDE A SWIMMING POOL AND SQUASH COURT.THEY ARE NOT OPEN TO THE GENERAL PUBLIC.
